text.section: On or before July 1 of each year, the Commissioner shall submit a report, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, to the General Assembly about the use of territory as a factor in establishing private passenger automobile insurance rates by insurers and the Maryland Automobile Insurance Fund.

The report shall provide information on:
the number of insurers actively engaged in providing private passenger automobile insurance coverage in the State; and
the number of insurers that use territory as a factor in establishing private passenger automobile insurance rates.
